title: Gold and silver reach fresh highs for second day running — and could keep climbing

title: Why Oil Markets Are Worried About Venezuelan Oil Seizures
summary: Oil markets are on edge as the U.S. escalates its seizures of sanctioned oil tankers off the coast of Venezuela, boarding a second tanker on Saturday before pursuing a third out into the Atlantic on Sunday. title: Sanctioned Ships Still Loading Venezuelan Oil Despite U.S. Blockade
summary: At least half a dozen sanctioned tankers have loaded oil from Venezuela since December 11, when the U.S. escalated the pressure on Venezuelan oil exports, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday, quoting data from Kpler. title: How U.S. oil tanker seizures targeting Venezuela are linked to rising geopolitical tensions with China
summary: U.S. seizures of vessels carrying Venezuelan oil may become a bigger strategic pressure point in the geopolitical battle with China, a major buyer of the crude.

title: Gold and silver hit record highs on geopolitical tensions
